alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 07 at 2:41AM EST until November 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding possible in high tide cycles through this evening. For the Coastal Flood Watch, significant coastal flooding possible Tuesday through Thursday as a tropical disturbance approaches from the east. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach, Coastal Broward and Coastal Miami- Dade Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Statement, through late tonight. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from late tonight into Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Coastal Palm Beach County
